last_episode_to_air.name: The Saphrax Protocol
last_episode_to_air.overview: Deep inside Guild Headquarters, the Monarch and 21 face their ultimate ordeal; the Venture brothers confront one of their own.

name: The Venture Bros.
overview: Hank and Dean Venture, with their father Doctor Venture and faithful bodyguard Brock Samson, go on wild adventures facing megalomaniacs, zombies, and suspicious ninjas, all for the glory of adventure. Or something like that.

episodes.name: Dia de Los Dangerous!
episodes.overview: When the Venture Family visits Tijuana for a lecture Dr. Venture is giving at the (community) University of Mexico, the dastardly Monarch weaves a cocoon of villainy that leaves the Venture brothers trapped in his clutches.

episodes.name: Careers in Science
episodes.overview: Careers in Science: The Venture family must travel to space to repair an orbiting space station that Dr. Venture's father built in the 1970s, but a mysterious space phantom could be haunting the station!

episodes.name: Home Insecurity
episodes.overview: To protect the Venture compound while Brock is on his yearly mountain survival sabbatical, Dr. Venture builds a panic room and a robotic bodyguard, which are soon put to the test.

episodes.name: The Incredible Mr. Brisby
episodes.overview: Dr. Venture is offered a job by theme park owner and cartoon magnate Roy Brisby, who won't take no for an answer in his quest for worldwide entertainment dominance.

episodes.name: Eeney, Meeney, Miney... Magic!
episodes.overview: Dr. Venture's new experiment has the entire family interested--not to mention trapped inside! The Ventures' strange new neighbor, master of mysticism Dr. Orpheus, may be the only one who can help them escape.

episodes.name: Ghosts of the Sargasso
episodes.overview: On a scientific expedition in the Bermuda Triangle, Doc's experimental equipment awakens and possibly enrages the submerged ghost of Major Tom, a test pilot who crashed in an experimental aircraft designed by Doc's father.

episodes.name: Ice Station – Impossible!
episodes.overview: Dr. Venture, Pete White and Master Billy Quizboy are invited to take part in a top secret government think tank run by supergenius Professor Impossible.

episodes.name: Mid-Life Chrysalis
episodes.overview: The Monarch sends Dr. Girlfriend undercover to seduce Dr. Venture in order to inject him with a body-altering serum.

episodes.name: Are You There, God? It's Me, Dean
episodes.overview: The Monarch finally has the Venture family right where he wants them hanging upside down above the Amazon river! But his victory is postponed when Dean suffers a strange but fairly common injury, acute testicular tortion.

episodes.name: Tag Sale – You're It!
episodes.overview: Always short on cash, Dr. Venture decides to unload some of his father's old scientific equipment in a huge yard sale that attracts fellow scientists and super-villains alike.

episodes.name: Past Tense
episodes.overview: When Brock and Dr. Venture are kidnapped from the funeral of a college friend, the boys enlist the aid of the original Team Venture: a group of superscience adventurers who worked for their grandfather in the sixties.

episodes.name: The Trial of the Monarch
episodes.overview: The Monarch is on trial for the one crime he may not have committed, under mysterious circumstances stemming from his bitter breakup with Dr. Girlfriend.

episodes.name: Return to Spider-Skull Island
episodes.overview: Dr. Venture finally learns the secret of his recurring womb nightmares when a stomach tumor turns out to be something far more sinister. In a fit of jealousy over their mistaken belief their father is pregnant, the boys run away from home.

episodes.name: Powerless in the Face of Death
episodes.overview: Team Venture struggles to pick up the pieces of their shattered lives and move on in the wake of Hank and Dean's violent and untimely deaths.

guest_stars.character: Swifty / Hector / Crime-o-dile Henchman / White Noise (voice)
guest_stars.name: Brendon Small

episodes.name: Hate Floats
episodes.overview: Aided by Henchmen 21, 24 and new recruits, The Monarch attempts to rebuild his villainous empire and rekindle his relationship with Dr. Girlfriend.

episodes.name: Assassinanny 911
episodes.overview: When Brock is reactivated by O.S.I., he subcontracts his ex-girlfriend, Molotov Cocktease, to protect the Venture Compound from enemies.

episodes.name: Escape to the House of Mummies Part II
episodes.overview: Continuing last week's adventure, Team Venture find themselves trapped in the clutches of a bloodthirsty Egyptian cult and their time machine.

episodes.name: 20 Years to Midnight
episodes.overview: Brock's discovery of a videotape from Jonas Venture Sr. sets Team Venture on a global hunt for pieces of a fantastic and potentially deadly machine.

episodes.name: Victor. Echo. November.
episodes.overview: Phantom Limb and Dr. Girlfriend agree to a civil double date with The Monarch to discuss his official re-entry into the Guild of Calamitous Intent.

episodes.name: Love-Bheits
episodes.overview: Baron Ünderbheit captures Team Venture when the X-1 crash lands in Ünderland while en route from a superscience costume party.

episodes.name: Fallen Arches
episodes.overview: Dr. Orpheus calls upon old friends The Alchemist and Jefferson Twilight to resurrect their former super-team, The Order of the Triad.

episodes.name: Guess Who's Coming to State Dinner?
episodes.overview: The ghost of Abraham Lincoln and Team Venture investigate an insidious plot to assassinate the President.

episodes.name: I Know Why the Caged Bird Kills
episodes.overview: The Monarch continues to rebuild his villainous empire with the aid of Dr. Henry Killinger, but Henchman 21 is suspicious of his deadly charms.

episodes.name: ¡Viva los Muertos!
episodes.overview: When Dr. Venture finally attains the holy grail of superscience, a gang of former teen sleuths is convinced that the Venture Compound is haunted.

episodes.name: Showdown at Cremation Creek (1)
episodes.overview: The stage is set for a deadly, ultimate showdown between The Monarch and Phantom Limb for the hand of Dr. Girlfriend.

episodes.name: Showdown at Cremation Creek (2)
episodes.overview: The fate of almost everyone in the Venture universe hangs in the balance as The Sovereign reveals his identity and stuff explode all over the place.

episodes.name: Shadowman 9: In the Cradle of Destiny
episodes.overview: The wait is over. The truths and half-truths about Dr. Venture's former arch nemeses, Dr. Girlfriend and The Monarch, are finally revealed (albeit obliquely) in an episode spanning twenty years.

episodes.name: The Doctor Is Sin
episodes.overview: Dr. Venture learns that a life with no arch enemy is not nearly so sweet when he finds himself besieged by C-list pretenders to the Monarch's throne, and his super-science business once again on the rocks.

episodes.name: The Invisible Hand of Fate
episodes.overview: At long last, The Venture Bros. peels away the onion-like shrouds of time for a look back into the troubled past of America's most beloved hydrocephalic former boy genius.

episodes.name: Home Is Where The Hate Is
episodes.overview: As The Monarch and Dr. Mrs. The Monarch settle into their new home and a new, no-more-arching-Dr.-Venture anymore life, Dr. Venture receives an unorthodox introduction to his new Guild-assigned nemesis.

episodes.name: The Buddy System
episodes.overview: Dr. Venture, in a bid to make some much-needed money, opens up the compound as "Rusty's Day Camp for Boy Adventurers." But while the children are kept busy with activities.

episodes.name: Dr. Quymn, Medicine Woman
episodes.overview: Love is in the air, kind of, when Dr. Venture encounters his childhood friend, Dr. Tara Quymn, in the Amazon Rain Forest.

episodes.name: What Goes Down, Must Come Up
episodes.overview: All basements are kinda spooky, but the Ventures are about to learn the hard way that beneath the foundations of the Venture Compound lie deep, dark secrets.

episodes.name: Tears of a Sea Cow
episodes.overview: Bored and under-whelmed with his new Guild-assigned arch-enemies, The Monarch seeks to re-spark his old hatred by secretly visiting the Venture Compound while Dr. Venture is away at the Science Now conference.

episodes.name: Now Museum, Now You Don't
episodes.overview: Determined to honor the father he never knew, Jonas Jr. converts Spider Skull Island into a Team Venture Museum. Unfortunately, he invited all of his father's surviving friends and enemies to the grand opening.

episodes.name: The Lepidopterists
episodes.overview: The Monarch launches his first attack on his new arch nemesis, the other Dr. Venture. But Jonas has the formidable defenses of Spider-Skull Island on his side, as well as his own Team Venture.

episodes.name: ORB
episodes.overview: A series of cryptic clues sends Team Venture out to uncover a mystery left by the late Jonas Venture, Sr. As each new solved riddle exposes one more piece of secret Venture history.

guest_stars.character: Jonas Venture Sr. / Sandow / Samuel Clemens (voice)
guest_stars.name: Paul Boocock

episodes.name: The Family That Slays Together, Stays Together (1)
episodes.overview: Brock Samson is a marked man.

episodes.name: The Family That Slays Together, Stays Together (2)
episodes.overview: Brock and the Venture family are on the run from the Law, the Monarch, Sgt. Hatred and the entire O.S.I.! Only bald ingenuity and an unlikely ally can possibly save their necks from the deadly noose tightening around the Venture Compound.

episodes.name: Blood of the Father, Heart of Steel
episodes.overview: Henchman 21 copes with life without 24. Brock and the Venture family are forced to part ways. Discover the final fate of H.E.L.P.eR. And Dean must kill Hitler.

episodes.name: Handsome Ransom
episodes.overview: The Monarch decides to settle for cash as the best revenge on Dr. Venture and takes Hank and Dean hostage. However, Hank is rescued by Captain Sunshine, who wants a new boy sidekick to replace his fallen comrade Wonder Boy.

episodes.name: Perchance to Dean
episodes.overview: Rusty begins to indoctrinate Dean into his career as a super scientist, not knowing that a deformed and believed aborted Dean clone stalks the compound. The deformed clone's attempt to kill Dean leads to a mix up with Hank thinking that he's killed his brother, while local police prepare to raid the Compound after a UPS delivery man suspects illegal activities going on.

episodes.name: Return to Malice
episodes.overview: Henchman 21 kidnaps the Venture brothers without The Monarch's knowledge or consent, resulting in Sgt. Hatred having to storm his former hometown of Malice to rescue his charges. We also learn of the recent activities of 21 since the death of 24.

episodes.name: The Revenge Society
episodes.overview: The Guild of Calamitous Intent comes under attack by an insane Phantom Limb, who now goes by the name "Revenge". Meanwhile, Hank and Sergeant Hatred must protect the compound from the Guild's agents. We also learn something very interesting about Dean's birthright.

episodes.name: Self-Medication
episodes.overview: While Dr. Venture goes into therapy with other boy adventurers, Sgt. Hatred takes Dean and Hank to the movies, only to have a relapse.

episodes.name: The Better Man
episodes.overview: After seeing the OutRider, the man who stole his wife, pass through the Second World, Dr. Orpheus is determined to do the same. Meanwhile, Hank takes Dean to the mall to teach him how to talk to girls, and Triana has a life-altering discussion with The Master.

episodes.name: Pinstripes & Poltergeists
episodes.overview: While the Monarch schemes to dispose of Dr. Venture once and for all, Henchman 21 seeks revenge on Brock for the death of 24.

episodes.name: The Diving Bell vs. The Butterglider
episodes.overview: Brock, Hank, and Dean must go on a fantastic voyage into Rusty's brain to find out why he's in a coma. Meanwhile, Henchman 21 demands new henchsuits, but the Monarch is too busy obsessing with his latest purchase, a butter-glider.

episodes.name: Pomp & Circuitry
episodes.overview: Hank and Dean graduate from their education beds, and look into college. Hank rebels and tries to join Sphinx. Meanwhile, Phantom Limb breaks out of the Guild's dungeons and seeks revenge once more.

episodes.name: Any Which Way But Zeus
episodes.overview: Someone is capturing heroes and villains and taking them to a super death camp. The forces of good and evil must join forces to stop their mysterious captor.

episodes.name: Everybody Comes to Hank's
episodes.overview: Hank opens a detective agency and enters a dark world of sinister crime and shady women.

episodes.name: Bright Lights, Dean City
episodes.overview: Dean ends up interning with Professor Impossible, and discovers that his new employer is a member of the Revenge Society.

episodes.name: Assisted Suicide
episodes.overview: Dr. Venture is possessed by an entity that attempts to make him commit suicide, and Dr. Orpheus tries to save him.

episodes.name: The Silent Partners
episodes.overview: Conjectural Technologies' newfound success hits a snag when Billy is kidnapped by the same mysterious benefactors who invested in their company, and SPHINX launches an investigation aimed at determining who is behind these dubious financiers.

episodes.name: Operation: P.R.O.M.
episodes.overview: Team Venture, Conjectural Technologies and the Order of the Triad come together as Dean and Hank prepare to face an obstacle that is more intimidating then anything they have confronted before: a prom to celebrate their "graduating" high school, while Dr. Venture throws out all the stops to bring the twins the best dance $500 can buy. But when things go awry, the greatest battle in Venture history looms as two old enemies - the OSI and SPHINX - clash once again.

episodes.name: What Color Is Your Cleansuit?
episodes.overview: A three-month period in the lives of our heroes and villains is chronicled. Dr. Venture recruits college interns to help him complete a project for J.J. in time, but things go awry. Dean makes a life-changing decision after Triana rejects him, and Billy Quizboy acquires a new archenemy.

episodes.name: Venture Libre
episodes.overview: The Ventures travel into the jungles of Central America to find an invention that has developed a mind of its own.

episodes.name: SPHINX Rising
episodes.overview: While the Monarch and his wife attempt to destroy the Venture compound once and for all, the Monarch learns a startling secret about his past. Meanwhile, Twenty-One tries to create a new SPHINX... and inadvertently recruits the members of the old SPHINX.

episodes.name: Spanakopita!
episodes.overview: A figure from Dr. Venture's past haunts him during his annual vacation to Spanikos.

episodes.name: O.S.I. Love You
episodes.overview: OSI has a riot on their hands when the super-villains in their custody make a desperate bid to escape.

episodes.name: Momma's Boys
episodes.overview: Dean pays a visit to the mystery woman in his life, while Hank and Dermott play a prank on Dr. Venture which leads him on a quest to find his mystery friend and rescue him.

episodes.name: Bot Seeks Bot
episodes.overview: Brock goes undercover to rescue a volunteer undercover operative helping the OSI track down the Council of 13, and ends up in a night club...

episodes.name: The Devil's Grip
episodes.overview: When Rusty is apparently killed by the Monarch, Hatred sends the boys off to live with their godparents, and then turns to Twenty-One for help to infiltrate the Flying Cocoon and recover Rusty's body.

episodes.name: Hostile Makeover
episodes.overview: The Ventures are back! And they’re movin’ on up to a deluxe apartment in the sky. But will mo’ money bring mo’ problems? And can The Monarch handle the commute?

episodes.name: Maybe No Go
episodes.overview: White and Billy grapple with their archenemy in their old neighborhood; Doc realizes he cannot face his responsibilities alone.

episodes.name: Faking Miracles
episodes.overview: Doc uncovers a mysterious invention that could make or break Dean's college aspirations and The Monarch makes a bad first impression on Dr. Mrs. The Monarch's co-workers.

episodes.name: Rapacity In Blue
episodes.overview: A super villain launches an assault on the Ventures and Doc's latest invention or a blue vigilante may save the day.

episodes.name: Tanks for Nuthin'
episodes.overview: A super-widow surfaces and makes Dr. Mrs. The Monarch's job difficult while a criminal genius tries to arch Dr. Venture.

episodes.name: It Happening One Night
episodes.overview: Avant-garde supervillains try to arch Dr. Venture while Hank searches for love in a den of ninjas.

episodes.name: A Party for Tarzan
episodes.overview: In a case of mistaken identity, the Guild targets Dr. Venture for assassination, pooping his party for a fancy new friend.

episodes.name: Red Means Stop
episodes.overview: The Guild of Calamitous Intent sets a trap for Blue Morpho with a notorious villain as the bait. Meanwhile, two battered men struggle to escape from their mysterious imprisonment.

episodes.name: The Venture Bros. and the Curse of the Haunted Problem
episodes.overview: The Venture headquarters is either possessed, just regular haunted, or suffering from a computer glitch; Dr. Orpheus and the Order of the Triad are called upon to unlock the mystery.

episodes.name: The Rorqual Affair
episodes.overview: Deadly waters surround the Monarch when he becomes Wide Wale’s prisoner

episodes.name: Arrears in Science
episodes.overview: The Morphic Trilogy reaches its conclusion in a decades-spanning tale of friendship, betrayal and mass murder that overwrites Venture history.

episodes.name: The High Cost of Loathing
episodes.overview: The Monarch faces financial challenges as he attempts to rebuild his fiendish organization; Dean tries to establish a normal life outside of his father's shadow at sleep-away college.

episodes.name: The Inamorata Consequence
episodes.overview: The Venture family returns to their old compound where intrigue, danger, jackets, and diplomacy await.

episodes.name: The Bellicose Proxy
episodes.overview: The Monarch and 21 play a deadly game of tutoring an inexperienced villain; a hot plate of danger is served up with a side of hilarity.

episodes.name: The Unicorn in Captivity
episodes.overview: Dr. Venture's latest invention is a real game-changer, and the new game is deadly.

episodes.name: The Terminus Mandate
episodes.overview: The members of Guild Council must face their archrivals for one last time, while Doc happily falls into a black widow's deadly web.

episodes.name: The Forecast Manufacturer
episodes.overview: The city is hit with a mysterious blizzard that launches Team Venture into action; the Monarch and 21 are sent on a deadly mission to a secret island fortress.

episodes.name: The Saphrax Protocol
episodes.overview: Deep inside Guild Headquarters, the Monarch and 21 face their ultimate ordeal; the Venture brothers confront one of their own.
